name: INSITU
description:
WASD - Movement

Space - Action

R - restarts the game

F - Fullscreen

get the crystalball and go to the ship to advance to the next level!

!THIS GAME IS FAR FROM FINISHED AND I'LL KEEP ON UPDATING IT AS SOON AS I CAN !

Update #3

  • Added an alien that will hunt you down if you take to long.
  • Minor bugfixes.

Update #2

  • Visual upgrades and cool effects! also a titlescreen!
  • working name is now INSITU

Update #1

  • the game now tells you the cause of death.
  • Tooltips!
  • New building! the teleporter. it saves you from death, but it will cost you.
